sections.title: Government Grants
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under IAS 20.

items.question: Does the entity disclose the accounting policy for government grants?
Does the entity disclose the methods of presentation of government grants in the financial statements?
Does the entity disclose the nature and extent of government grants recognised in the financial statements?
Does the entity provide an indication of other forms of government assistance from which it has directly benefited?
Does the entity disclose any unfulfilled conditions and other contingencies attaching to government assistance that has been recognised?
